DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Passive: Gain 2 block at the beginning of turn. NL Evoke: Spend all holy. Gain 10 block per holy spent.
Passive: Gain 1 thorns at the beginning of turn. NL Evoke: Spend all holy. Deal 7 damage to each enemy per holy spent.
Passive: Gain 1 regeneration at the beginning of turn. NL Evoke: Spend all holy. Heal 5 hp per holy spent.
